mapper.select: select boardnum, memberid, title, contents, hits, to_char(inputdate, 'yy/mm/dd') inputdate from spring5_board order by boardnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into spring5_board(boardnum, memberid, title, contents, originalfile) values(spring5_board_seq.nextval, #{memberid}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{originalfile})
mapper.update: update spring5_board set hits = #{hits} where boardnum = #{boardnum}
